translation.en: Like you've been deciding a lot of things lately.
translation.de: Wie so oft in letzter Zeit.

translation.en: What are you even talking about?
Why didn't you tell me that it wasn't the police who called you?
translation.de: Warum hast du nicht gesagt, dass nicht die Polizei angerufen hat?

translation.en: It was somebody else who made sure you went down there, right?
translation.de: Sondern jemand, der dich weglocken wollte.

translation.en: Who told you that?
Detective Chesler dropped by.
And she was asking a lot of questions,
translation.de: Und sie hat viele Fragen gestellt.

translation.en: about you,
about what happened the night of the diner.
What is that about, Adam?
[scoffs] How should I know?
Who called?
-Who sent you to the police station? -I don't know!
translation.de: -Wer hat dich zur Polizei geschickt? -Keine Ahnung!

translation.en: My bad, I was gonna tell you about it.
It's a whole lot of other stuff has been happening right now. What other stuff?
translation.de: -Aber ich habe eben viel um die Ohren. -Ach, was denn?

translation.en: I think I'm being followed.
What?
I kind of had the feeling before.
translation.de: Das Gefühl habe ich schon länger.

translation.en: Today, I just went driving around, just around.
translation.de: Heute bin ich einfach nur rumgefahren.

translation.en: I kept seeing the same car.
Did you go to the bank?
-Come on, we said we would not do that. -No, Adam. No bullshit.
translation.de: -Komm schon, wir sagten doch... -Hör auf, Adam.

translation.en: Just tell me. Did you go to the bank today?
translation.de: Sei ehrlich. Warst du heute auf der Bank?

translation.en: Did you take money out?
I noticed him.
So I figured, you know, it wouldn't be a good idea. Just in case.
translation.de: Und da dachte ich... dass es keine gute Idee wäre. Falls...

translation.en: In case he was after the money.
translation.de: Er hinter dem Geld her ist.

translation.en: -We don't know that. -Why else is he watching you?
translation.de: -Das wissen wir nicht. -Warum folgt er dir dann?

translation.en: Look, maybe I'm just paranoid. Okay? Maybe there's nobody who's following me. I don't know.
translation.de: Vielleicht bin ich nur paranoid. Vielleicht folgt mir gar niemand.

translation.en: You got sent down to the police station, Adam.
translation.de: Du wurdest aufs Revier zitiert, Adam.

translation.en: That way, I'm here alone.
That way, Hayden shows up, tries to intimidate me,
translation.de: Deshalb konnte Hayden aufkreuzen und mich einschüchtern.

translation.en: scare us out of the house. What is that? Why is he here?
translation.de: Um uns zu verjagen. Weshalb war er wohl sonst hier?

translation.en: Because he probably knows.
I warned you.
Chesler.
Hey, Tom.
You did?
Great.
Great, okay. Hold on.
All right, so probably just from the last four, five months.
translation.de: Wahrscheinlich genügen die letzten vier, fünf Monate.

translation.en: We're looking for any checks drawn on an account from a Leonard Wellsley.
translation.de: Wir suchen nach Schecks von einem gewissen Leonard Wellsley.

translation.en: Yeah, made out to her name.
Yeah.
It's Kate... Franklin.
Listen, can you see what you got on the husband too?
translation.de: Kannst du auch den Ehemann abklopfen?

translation.en: It's a different last name.
It's an Adam Kettner with a "K."
Great, get back to me as soon as you can. Thanks.
translation.de: Gut. Melde dich, so schnell du kannst. Danke.

translation.en: What are you looking for?
Leonard didn't just stash that money.
translation.de: Leonard hat das Geld nicht einfach gebunkert.

translation.en: It had to come from somewhere. There has to be a reason.
translation.de: Es muss irgendwoher kommen, einen Grund geben.

translation.en: Does that even matter now?
Julia said...
if they find out we've been hiding something illegal,
translation.de: Wenn rauskommt, dass wir etwas Illegales getan haben,

translation.en: we could lose everything.
All right.
So what do you suggest? We just give it all back?
translation.de: Und jetzt? Sollen wir es zurückgeben?

translation.en: I don't know.
Yeah, maybe.
-To whom, Katie? -I don't know!
But this never felt right.
I'm not going back to the way things were before.
translation.de: Ich will nicht mehr so leben wie früher.

translation.en: Adam.
We may not have a choice.
We always have a choice.
I had absolutely no idea that Mr. Wellsley left Katie the house.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, dass Katie das Haus geerbt hat.

translation.en: That seems a little...
excessive.
Doesn't it, though?
What can you tell me about her husband?
translation.de: Was wissen Sie über ihren Mann?

translation.en: I've never met the man.
So you had nothing to do with hiring him?
translation.de: Sie hatten also nichts damit zu tun?

translation.en: As a gardener at the house.
No. It's strictly against our policy for family members to work together.
translation.de: Nein. Familienmitglieder dürfen bei uns nicht zusammenarbeiten.

translation.en: Our patients are elderly, infirm.
translation.de: Unsere Patienten sind alt und gebrechlich.

translation.en: We can't risk that kind of potential distraction.
So, do you know of Ms. Franklin ever breaking the rules before?
translation.de: Hat Miss Franklin schon mal gegen die Regeln verstoßen?

translation.en: Never, no.
No, she absolutely understood the importance of her job, especially...
translation.de: Sie wusste um die Tragweite Ihrer Tätigkeit. Insbesondere... bei Mr. Wellsley.

translation.en: with Mr. Wellsley.
Why especially him?
Well, you wouldn't have known it to look at him, but his health was very delicate.
translation.de: Nun, man sah es ihm nicht unbedingt an, aber er war sehr... labil.

translation.en: You know, Katie told me, she kept a notebook, like, a daily log, just to keep track of his medication.
translation.de: Katie führte sogar täglich Buch über seine Medikation.

translation.en: Do you happen to have a record of his medications?
translation.de: Haben Sie Aufzeichnungen über seine Medikation?

translation.en: You'd have to speak with his doctor about that.
translation.de: Da müssen Sie seinen Arzt fragen.

translation.en: Right. How about Ms. Franklin's contract, how much she was being paid?
translation.de: Verstehe. Und Miss Franklins Vertrag? Ihre Bezüge?

translation.en: Yeah, sure, we can get that to you.
translation.de: Ja, sicher. Den können Sie haben.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Excellent. Thank you. And let me...
just ask you. Did she...
Did she ever mention a raise?
translation.de: Hat sie je eine Gehaltserhöhung erwähnt?

translation.en: Good lord.
She deposited that check just before Wellsley died.
translation.de: Dieser Scheck wurde kurz vor Wellsleys Tod eingelöst.

translation.en: Was she really taking money from that poor old man all along?
translation.de: Hat sie wirklich die ganze Zeit Geld von ihm genommen?

translation.en: It's a good question.
Adam!
Shit!
These were never cashed.
You okay?
I think I know who that is.
What?
Leonard said something about hiring a gardener.
I think I told you about this.
A guy named Ethan. This was a couple years ago.
translation.de: Einen Kerl namens Ethan. Vor ein paar Jahren.

translation.en: So he's been up there for a while.
translation.de: Er ist wohl schon eine Weile da oben.

translation.en: There were checks made out to Ethan Doyle.
translation.de: Da waren Schecks. Ausgestellt auf Ethan Doyle.

translation.en: They were never cashed.
Leonard said, one day, he just stopped showing up.
translation.de: Laut Leonard kam er irgendwann nicht mehr.

translation.en: Never heard from him again.
translation.de: Er hat ihn nie wieder gesehen.

translation.en: Somebody shot him.
You looked?
He must have bled to death up there.
translation.de: Er ist wohl da oben verblutet.

translation.en: He was murdered.
Yeah. I think so.
But...
Leonard couldn't have known he was there.
Right? I mean, he would have helped him.
translation.de: Oder? Er hätte ihm doch geholfen.

translation.en: And why would Doyle hide out in the shed? Why not... come into the house?
translation.de: Und warum war Doyle im Schuppen? Warum nicht im Haus?

translation.en: Maybe these have something to do with it.
translation.de: Vielleicht hat das etwas damit zu tun.

translation.en: Take a guess.
-Do you think they're real? -Why else would he hide them?
translation.de: -Sind die echt? -Warum sollte er sie sonst verstecken?

translation.en: Shit!
Here! Just--
-Oh, God! -Oh, my God.
Give them here. Come on.
-I'm sorry. -Dammit.
-Don't answer. -[Mr. Calvern] I saw your car.
But I can't. My car is parked outside. They know I'm here.
translation.de: Mein Auto steht draußen. Sie wissen, dass ich hier bin.

translation.en: -Okay, I'm just gonna... -I got it.
[Mr. Calvern] Open the door! Do you hear me? Katie!
translation.de: Machen Sie auf! Hören Sie? Katie!

translation.en: [Mr. Calvern] Katie, open the door please!
I'm sorry. This really isn't a good time.
Well, yeah. I'm sure you're very busy settling into your new home.
translation.de: Oh, ja. Ihr neues Heim hält Sie sicher auf Trab.

translation.en: You should be ashamed of yourself.
How could you take advantage of that poor man?
-What? -Look, I knew something was up. I could feel it.
translation.de: Ich wusste, dass etwas faul ist.

translation.en: But you know what? You had him so frightened he couldn't even tell me.
translation.de: Aber er hat sich wohl nicht getraut zu reden.

translation.en: It's not-- No!
I'm not letting you tarnish my company's good name.
translation.de: Sie werden meinen Namen nicht beschmutzen.

translation.en: -Mr. Calvern-- -I'll find proof!
I'm gonna call the police!
-I'm gonna have you arrested! -This really isn't a good time.
[shouting] This isn't over, Katie! I'll be back!
translation.de: Es ist noch nicht vorbei, Katie! Ich komme wieder!

translation.en: I'm gonna find out what's been going on in this house, one way or another!
translation.de: Ich finde heraus, was hier passiert ist! So oder so!

translation.en: I'm not letting this go! You hear me? I'm not gonna lose my business over this!
translation.de: Das lasse ich nicht zu, hören Sie? Sie werden meine Firma nicht ruinieren!

translation.en: Why isn't this full?
[Adam] Katie?
[Adam] Hey, Katie!
-Didn't you hear me? -Hi, sorry. I was making tea. You want some?
translation.de: -Hast du mich nicht gehört? -Ich habe Tee gekocht. Willst du einen?

translation.en: No. I got you a present.
translation.de: Nein. Ich habe etwas für dich.

translation.en: A new phone?
Yeah. Got one for each of us.
New numbers too. I figured the way things were going, we could both use a little privacy.
translation.de: Und neue Nummern. Etwas Privatsphäre kann nicht schaden.

translation.en: We can't keep them.
-Katie-- -Adam, no.
There is a dead man out there. He was murdered.
translation.de: Da draußen liegt ein toter Mann. Er wurde ermordet.

translation.en: He stole those diamonds. And who knows what else he may have done, who he may have hurt.
translation.de: Er hat diese Diamanten gestohlen. Und wer weiß, was er noch getan hat.

translation.en: These things don't just go away like they never happened.
translation.de: So etwas löst sich nicht einfach in Luft auf.

translation.en: -The police must be looking for him. -Don't you get this?
translation.de: -Die Polizei sucht ihn sicher. -Verstehst du nicht?

translation.en: Doyle stole the diamonds,
got himself shot, and then he died out there all by himself.
translation.de: wurde angeschossen und starb dann da draußen, allein.

translation.en: It's like-- It's like he fell down a well.
translation.de: Als wäre er in einen Brunnen gefallen.

translation.en: Two years later,
nobody knows what happened to him or the diamonds. We can do whatever we want.
translation.de: Niemand weiß, was passiert ist. Wir können tun, was wir wollen.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'm calling Detective Chesler.
translation.de: -Was machst du? -Ich rufe Detective Chesler an.

translation.en: -We need to tell her-- -No! Wait!
Wait, just-- Okay, hang on. Just listen to me for just a second.
translation.de: Warte, ok? Hör mir nur eine Sekunde zu.

translation.en: Okay, ask yourself. What the heck was Doyle doing here in the first place?
translation.de: Ok? Denk doch mal nach. Warum zum Teufel war Doyle hier?

translation.en: Why take some crappy gardening job if he's planning to steal a fortune in diamonds?
translation.de: Warum dieser Drecksjob, wenn er vorhatte, einen Haufen Diamanten zu klauen?

translation.en: I don't know.
Some old guy's house digging up weeds
is the last place that anybody's gonna come looking for him.
translation.de: Das war doch die perfekte Tarnung.

translation.en: I mean, think about it. Why else wouldn't he cash the checks?
translation.de: Warum hat er die Schecks nie eingelöst?

translation.en: He didn't want to leave a paper trail.
That way he sets up the big score.
translation.de: So plante er den großen Coup.

translation.en: Nobody knows about this place and he can just hide here
translation.de: Niemand wusste davon. Hier konnte er sich verstecken,

translation.en: for as long as he needs to.
Although, I'm sure that getting shot and dying out there
translation.de: Obwohl erschossen zu werden sicher nicht Teil seines Plans war.

translation.en: -was probably not a part of the plan. -That doesn't change anything.
translation.de: Obwohl erschossen zu werden sicher nicht Teil seines Plans war. Das ändert nichts. Wir können die Diamanten nicht behalten.

translation.en: We can't keep those diamonds.
translation.de: Das ändert nichts. Wir können die Diamanten nicht behalten.

translation.en: All right, so what about the money?
What are we gonna do about that?
What do you mean?
If we do this, then the police put us under a microscope,
translation.de: Wenn wir das tun, durchleuchten sie uns.

translation.en: so how is that going to look?
We took the money from here and then we hid it in the bank. What are they gonna think?
translation.de: Dass wir das Geld genommen haben? Was werden sie denken?

translation.en: We'll explain it to them.
Tell them it was Leonard's money, that it was his safety net.
translation.de: Dass es Leonards Geld war. Seine Ersparnisse.

translation.en: All right, and then what?
'Cause you heard what the lawyer said. Even if they believe us,
translation.de: Die Anwältin sagte doch: Selbst wenn sie uns glauben

translation.en: even if we don't end up in jail, we could still lose this place.
translation.de: und wir nicht im Knast landen, könnten wir das Haus verlieren.

translation.en: We don't need this house, Adam!
translation.de: Wir brauchen das Haus nicht, Adam!

translation.en: We don't need any of this.
Okay? As long as we have each other,
we're going to be all right.
All right?
I'm done with all right.
That's not enough anymore. I told you. I'm not going back to the way things were before.
translation.de: Das genügt nicht mehr. Ich sagte doch, ich will nicht mehr so leben.

translation.en: And what about that man out there? What are we supposed to do about that?
translation.de: Und der Mann da draußen? Was sollen wir mit ihm machen?

translation.en: Pretend it never happened? I'll take care of it.
translation.de: -So tun, als wäre nichts passiert? -Ich regle das.

translation.en: How? How are you gonna do that?
translation.de: Und wie? Wie willst du das regeln?

translation.en: This house
belongs to us now.
Okay, this is our future.
I'm not gonna let anybody take that away from us.
translation.de: Das lasse ich mir nicht wegnehmen.

translation.en: Look, everything is gonna be okay.
I'll take care of this for you.
[whispering] What are you doing?
[whispering] Someone's in the house.
[whispering] Where did you get that?
[whispering] Adam.
-[whispering] Don't. -[whispering] Don't move.
[whispering] We need to call 911.
Freeze, asshole!
Oh, my God.
How are you holding up, Katie?
Hell of a thing.
It was an accident.
Yeah, that's what they're saying.
Either way, law says it's self-defense, so...
translation.de: Laut Gesetz war es Selbstverteidigung, also...

translation.en: It still makes you wonder.
What was going through his head?
translation.de: Was hat er sich dabei gedacht?

translation.en: Why would he do something like that?
Just let himself into the house?
I don't know.
Something had to set him off.
translation.de: Er muss doch einen Grund gehabt haben.

translation.en: I know none of this is you, Katie.
What?
Everything was fine around here until Adam started work.
translation.de: Alles lief gut. Bis Adam anfing, hier zu arbeiten.

translation.en: So you can tell me whatever is going on.
translation.de: Sie können mir sagen, was los ist.

translation.en: I know that none of it is you.
translation.de: Ich weiß, dass Sie keine Schuld trifft.

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wovon Sie reden.

translation.en: I know about your money problems.
I know what that does to people.
translation.de: Und was so etwas mit einem macht.

translation.en: I know about the big check that you deposited from Mr. Wellsley.
translation.de: Ich weiß von dem Scheck, den Sie bekommen haben.

translation.en: You don't understand.
Okay, don't say anything, Katie. Just-- Just listen for a second.
translation.de: Schon gut, Katie. Hören Sie... Hören Sie mir einfach kurz zu.

translation.en: Because...
could be that...
it was a loan,
maybe it was a gift, who's to say?
But I want you to put yourself in my shoes. The big picture.
translation.de: Aber versetzen Sie sich in meine Lage. Sehen Sie das große Ganze.

translation.en: How all of a sudden, everything just drops in your lap.
translation.de: Wie Ihnen auf einmal alles in den Schoß fällt.

translation.en: -I told you-- -I mean, here I am,
the coroner tells me that the old guy died in his sleep.
translation.de: Laut Gerichtsmedizin ist der Alte im Schlaf gestorben.

translation.en: You tell me what his last wish was. And I figure, sure, why not?
translation.de: Sie erwähnen seinen letzten Wunsch und ich denke mir, klar, warum nicht?

translation.en: But it is not until after he's cremated
that you find a will. I didn't find it, I didn't even know about it.
translation.de: -...finden Sie ein Testament. -Ich habe gar nichts gefunden.

translation.en: And I don't even have a body.
I can't even prove that he didn't die a natural death.
translation.de: Ich kann seinen natürlichen Tod nicht beweisen.

translation.en: I mean I gotta tell you, it's starting to keep me up at night.
translation.de: Das beschäftigt mich ehrlich gesagt ziemlich.

translation.en: I would never hurt Leonard.
translation.de: Ich hätte Leonard nie etwas getan.

translation.en: I am not talking about you.
What?
Has Adam ever mentioned anyone by the name of Gaskin, a Ray Gaskin?
translation.de: Hat Adam je einen Mann namens Gaskin erwähnt? Einen Ray Gaskin?

translation.en: I know that name.
'Cause he tried to rob the diner that night,
and he also worked as a janitor at the university
translation.de: Und außerdem war er Hausmeister an der Uni,

translation.en: while Adam was taking classes.
-No, that's not... No. -Okay.
It's a big school. Maybe they never met.
translation.de: Die Uni ist groß. Vielleicht kennen Sie sich gar nicht.

translation.en: But sooner or later...
Adam is going to screw up.
It's only a matter of time.
translation.de: Es ist nur eine Frage der Zeit.

translation.en: Don't let him take you down with him.
translation.de: Lassen Sie sich da nicht mit reinziehen.

translation.en: You come to me.
Baby.
They wanna talk to you.
Hell of a thing.
-Katie! -Hey.
I heard what happened. Are you all right? I've been trying to call you.
translation.de: Ich hörte davon. Ist alles ok? Ich habe Sie nicht erreicht.

translation.en: My number's been changed.
I need to talk to you.
-Yeah. Come upstairs. -Okay.
And this Detective Chesler, do you believe her?
translation.de: Und diese Detective Chesler... Glauben Sie ihr?

translation.en: Is it possible that Adam had anything to do with what happened at the diner that night?
translation.de: Kann es sein, dass Adam in den Überfall verwickelt war?

translation.en: I don't know what to believe.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was ich glauben soll.

translation.en: Did Adam have any problems with Mr. Wellsley?
translation.de: Hatte Adam Ärger mit Mr. Wellsley?

translation.en: -Any issues? -No.
No, nothing.
If the police suspect that Adam had anything to do with his death,
translation.de: Wenn die Polizei glaubt, dass Adam etwas damit zu tun hat...

translation.en: they'll try to find a motive.
They're gonna try to claim that he hurried things along.
translation.de: Sie werden behaupten, er hätte die Sache beschleunigt.

translation.en: He hated being poor.
translation.de: Er hasste es, arm zu sein.

translation.en: Okay, listen to me.
If Chesler thinks she can make a case, she's not gonna waste any time.
translation.de: Wenn Chesler Verdacht schöpft, wird sie keine Zeit verschwenden.

translation.en: She's gonna try to get a warrant and search the house right away.
Can she do that?
You need to be asking yourself, will she find anything?
translation.de: Fragen Sie sich selbst. Wird sie etwas finden?

translation.en: You need to promise me.
Promise me that you'll help Adam too.
translation.de: Versprechen Sie... dass Sie auch Adam helfen werden.

translation.en: It's gone.
What?
The money.
Adam must have taken it.
That's what you found? Cash?
Yeah...
in the attic.
We thought it was stolen at first but...
translation.de: Wir dachten erst, es wäre gestohlen, aber...

translation.en: And then what changed your mind?
The diamonds.
So you found diamonds in the house?
translation.de: Sie haben Diamanten im Haus gefunden?

translation.en: In the living space above the garage.
Does Adam have these diamonds?
Yeah.
You need to stop him.
What? Why?
He knows you suspect something. That's why he took the money. He disappears and throws you to the cops.
translation.de: Er weiß, dass Sie Verdacht schöpfen. Er wird abhauen und Sie anschwärzen.

translation.en: No, Adam would never do that.
translation.de: Nein, das würde Adam nie tun.

translation.en: Are you sure?
You need to find him, bring him to the house and then call me.
translation.de: Finden Sie ihn. Bringen Sie ihn ins Haus und rufen Sie mich an.

translation.en: -You're not coming with me? -I need to hold off Detective Chesler.
I don't want her serving the search warrant till we know Adam's in the house.
translation.de: Sie soll abwarten, bis Adam im Haus ist.

translation.en: -Detective Chesler. -Detective Johnson. What have we got?
Garbage truck was making its rounds this morning, called it in.
translation.de: Die Müllmänner haben ihn heute Morgen gefunden.

translation.en: -How long's he been in there? -ME's still en route.
translation.de: -Wie lange lag er dort? -Der Pathologe war noch nicht da.

translation.en: You beat him here.
Damn.
Why did you call me?
There was a backpack next to the vic.
translation.de: Neben dem Opfer lag ein Rucksack.

translation.en: Inside we found an old laundry receipt.
It's pretty faded, but...
the address matches the name from one of your cases.
translation.de: ...Adresse und Name passen zu einem Ihrer Fälle.

translation.en: What's the name?
Come on, Adam, pick up.
-Where've you been? -Adam!
I'm up half the night talking to the cops.
translation.de: Ich rede die halbe Nacht mit den Bullen

translation.en: I wake up in the morning, you're already gone.
translation.de: und als ich aufwache, bist du weg.

translation.en: There's no note. You haven't answered your phone all day.
translation.de: Ohne Nachricht. Und ans Telefon gehst du auch nicht.

translation.en: -Where've you been, Katie? -The bank.
That's one of the things I need to talk to you about.
translation.de: Darüber wollte ich mit dir reden.

translation.en: -Why did you take the money? -Cause we're in a lot of trouble.
translation.de: -Warum hast du es genommen? -Weil wir in der Scheiße stecken.

translation.en: Checked up on that real estate agent, Hayden.
translation.de: Ich habe den Makler überprüft. Hayden.

translation.en: I mean, what's this guy's deal? Why's he so interested in selling this particular house?
translation.de: Was will er eigentlich? Warum ist er so scharf auf unser Haus?

translation.en: Guess what?
There's no record of a Mickey Hayden getting a real estate license.
translation.de: Es gibt keinen Makler namens Mickey Hayden.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah. He just got released from prison.
Did a couple years for robbing a jewelry store.
Jewelry?
One of those spots downtown. Doesn't even use a gun.
translation.de: Ein Laden in der Stadt. Ganz ohne Waffe.

translation.en: He just sweet talks his way through the security door,
translation.de: Er mogelte sich durch die Sicherheitstür,

translation.en: then he blindsides the armed guard,
does some old school, like, smash-and-grab.
translation.de: schnappte sich das Zeug und verschwand.

translation.en: Sixty seconds, comes out with three million dollars
translation.de: Sechzig Sekunden, drei Millionen Dollar Beute.

translation.en: in loose diamonds that were never recovered.
translation.de: Lose Diamanten, die nie gefunden wurden.

translation.en: -That's why he was here. -Hang on, it gets better.
translation.de: -Darum war er hier. -Es wird noch besser.

translation.en: Cops think that he had an accomplice that they never found.
translation.de: Laut Polizei hatte er wohl einen Komplizen.

translation.en: You wanna take a wild guess?
This other guy gets shot during the burglary, then he gets away.
translation.de: Er wurde bei dem Überfall angeschossen und entkam.

translation.en: Doyle got away with the diamonds.
And...
there's only one other person who could've known about it.
The one who shot him.
This bastard didn't bother to use a fake name. What did he think? We weren't smart enough to figure it out?
translation.de: Das ist auch noch sein echter Name. Dachte er, wir kommen nicht dahinter?
